title: petushka
author: petushka
content: Wallchain is the main partner of BNB Chain at Innovation Roadshow.Developers event hosted by BNB Chain in Dubai on the 18th od March.What to expect:Projection of TradiFi past on the future of DeFiThe future of MEVHow to act as a user, a protocol or a walletJoin us and stay tuned to be the first to hear about huge things to come:Discord | Reddit | Twitter | Telegram | InstagramDo you know you can get cashback from your transaction?With our extension, it's the user who directly activates Wallchain.You don't need any middleware to be able to act as a MEV bot on your own.Subscribe to our Newsletter to be the first adopter We are happy to meet our partners!Discord | Reddit | Twitter | Telegram | Instagram

comments.author: petushka
comments.body: Wallchain on BSC NEWS YouTube ChannelWatch live, 24 March 7PM UTC12PM PDT3PM EDTFind out more about Wallchain's innovative MEV solution.Get Your Money Back from Bots with Wallchain!Don't miss on BSC NEWS today

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: I see this topic acting more as ANN for Wallchain project, as there's no discussion at all here. If the replies you make in the future are just to make announcements, you better move this topic to a proper board. There you will find more targeted people (who just want to see the latest announcement of an altcoin project).
